message: Starting investigation of missing command processing logs - checking recent commands and enhanced logging implementation
Critical discovery: Implementer agent claims it inserted test command but command doesn't exist in database. Investigating database connectivity issue.
Root cause identified: realtime_channel.subscribe() hangs indefinitely at line 262 - spawning child agent to fix timeout handling
MISSION ACCOMPLISHED: Investigation complete. Root cause identified as hanging realtime subscription at line 262. Child fixer agent deployed to implement timeout solution.
